CustomField.formula: IF(LEN( Listing__r.Address__c )>0, Listing__r.Address__c& " " , "" ) & IF(LEN( Listing__r.City__c )>0, Listing__r.City__c& ", " , "" )& IF(LEN( Listing__r.State__c )>0, Listing__r.State__c& " " , "" )& IF(LEN( Listing__r.Zip_Code__c )>0, Listing__r.Zip_Code__c,"")
